segments.advisor_message: So, for your child, I recommend we list them as a dependent. What’s their full name again? Just to make sure we have it right.
segments.client_message: Uh, yeah, it’s like... um, John Doe? But, uh, do we really need to do that?

segments.advisor_message: Right, John Doe. Got it. And when is his birthday? We need that for the forms.
segments.client_message: It’s in February, I think? Like, um, 15th or somethin'. But, y'know, do we really have to put this stuff down? Seems kinda unnecessary...

segments.advisor_message: Well, for tax purposes, you usually need to if he’s still, you know, considered a dependent until a certain age. Do you know if he’s considered dependent until a specific date?
segments.client_message: I mean, he’s still in school, so like, that’s a long way to go, but I just... I dunno if this is all worth it...
